Get ready immediately!"},{"lineNumber":181024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブニャン様の言うことを聞かないと、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you don't listen to Lord Kaybnyan,"},{"lineNumber":181025,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス様に反乱分子だとチクられるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Kayblis will report you as a rebel."},{"lineNumber":181026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなれば、あの慎重なケイブリス様のこと、","translatedEnglishLine":"If that happens, knowing cautious Lord Kayblis,"},{"lineNumber":181027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　反乱の芽はすぐさま取り除くからな……","translatedEnglishLine":"he will immediately nip any sprouts of rebellion in the bud..."},{"lineNumber":181028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺達なんてあっという間に……","translatedEnglishLine":"We would be gone in no time..."},{"lineNumber":181029,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぞぉーっと魔物兵達は背筋を冷やした。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon soldiers felt a chill down their spines."},{"lineNumber":181030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怒りを買わないうちに、今すぐ向かうぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's head out immediately before we incur his wrath!"},{"lineNumber":181031,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全軍進軍じゅーんび！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Prepare for full army advance!"},{"lineNumber":181032,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうしてシャングリラに駐留していた","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, the 20,000 demon army stationed in Shangri-La"},{"lineNumber":181033,"originalJapaneseLine":"二万の魔軍は迅速に行動し、","translatedEnglishLine":"acted swiftly,"},{"lineNumber":181034,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰もいない砂漠に向かって出撃した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and launched towards the deserted desert."},{"lineNumber":181035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？　北東の端にある建物の中？","translatedEnglishLine":"What? In the building at the northeast edge?"},{"lineNumber":181036,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスはそんなとこにいるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is Kayblis really there?"},{"lineNumber":181037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうにゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yes, nya."},{"lineNumber":181038,"originalJapaneseLine":"　基本的に仕事もないんで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Basically, he has no work,"},{"lineNumber":181039,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもそこでボーッとしてるにゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so he’s always just spacing out there, nyan..."},{"lineNumber":181040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総大将なのに、んな端っこにいるのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though he’s the commander-in-chief, he’s in such a corner?"},{"lineNumber":181041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリス様はくっさいから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Kayblis smells bad,"},{"lineNumber":181042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんなの方が離れて行ったにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so everyone stayed away from him, nya."},{"lineNumber":181043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、ケイブリスの居場所は分かった！","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we know where Kayblis is!"},{"lineNumber":181044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後はブッ殺すだけだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Now all that’s left is to kill him!"},{"lineNumber":181045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　案内しろよ、ケイブニャン！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lead the way, Kaybnyan!"},{"lineNumber":181046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、ううう……殺されるにゃあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uuuu... I’m going to be killed, nya..."},{"lineNumber":181047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなこと話したってバレたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If it gets found out I said this,"},{"lineNumber":181048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ニャンは殺されるにゃあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"nyan will be killed..."},{"lineNumber":181049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、もうこうなったら絶対に勝つにゃんよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I-if it’s come to this, I absolutely have to win, nyan."},{"lineNumber":181050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このケイブニャン様が応援してやるにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This Lord Kaybnyan will be cheering for you, nya."},{"lineNumber":181051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ、じゃないとニャンは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-if not, nyan mistreatment of prisoners is a violation of the treaty, nya!"},{"lineNumber":181060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゅねーぶ、じゅねーぶ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Geneva, Geneva!"},{"lineNumber":181061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、ニャンには動物愛護団体がついてるにゃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, Nyan has an animal rights group backing him, nya!"},{"lineNumber":181062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愛護動物をみだりに殺したり、苛めた者は","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who kill or mistreat protected animals"},{"lineNumber":181063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二年以下の懲役、または二百万以下の罰金にゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"face up to two years imprisonment or fines up to two million, nya!"},{"lineNumber":181064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は使徒であって愛護動物ではなぁーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re an apostle, not a protected animal!"},{"lineNumber":181065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「びえーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Bwieeeen!"},{"lineNumber":181066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"However..."},{"lineNumber":181067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この体は未成熟すぎて、","translatedEnglishLine":"This body is too immature,"},{"lineNumber":181068,"originalJapaneseLine":"　モチベーションが湧かないぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t get motivated..."},{"lineNumber":181069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやいや、脱げばすごいタイプかも……","translatedEnglishLine":"No, no, maybe she's amazing once undressed..."},{"lineNumber":181070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほいっと」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here we go."},{"lineNumber":181071,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはケイブニャンの服をすぽーんと剥ぎ取った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance swiftly stripped off Kaybnyan’s clothes."},{"lineNumber":181072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":181073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":181074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……がっかり」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Disappointing."},{"lineNumber":181075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どういう意味にゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you mean, nya!"},{"lineNumber":181076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぶわわっ、裸に剥かれるなんて屈辱にゃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Buwawa, being stripped naked is a humiliation, nya!"},{"lineNumber":181077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゅねーぶさんに言って叱ってもらうにゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll tell Geneve-san to scold you, nya!"},{"lineNumber":181078,"originalJapaneseLine":"服を着ながらケイブニャンがふらぁ〜っと移動する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaybnyan, while dressing, swayed unsteadily as she moved."},{"lineNumber":181079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく、ニャンは何があっても","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, no matter what happens, nyan"},{"lineNumber":181080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間の言うことを聞いたりなんて――","translatedEnglishLine":"will never listen to what humans say—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、普段と命令の手順が違うが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the usual order procedure is different...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、誰かに確認を取った方がいいんじゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shouldn't we confirm this with someone?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、なにしてる、すぐに準備しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what are you doing? Get ready immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブニャン様の言うことを聞かないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you don't listen to Lord Kaybnyan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様に反乱分子だとチクられるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kayblis will report you as a rebel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなれば、あの慎重なケイブリス様のこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that happens, knowing cautious Lord Kayblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反乱の芽はすぐさま取り除くからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he will immediately nip any sprouts of rebellion in the bud...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達なんてあっという間に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We would be gone in no time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞぉーっと魔物兵達は背筋を冷やした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon soldiers felt a chill down their spines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怒りを買わないうちに、今すぐ向かうぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's head out immediately before we incur his wrath!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍進軍じゅーんび！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prepare for full army advance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうしてシャングリラに駐留していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the 20,000 demon army stationed in Shangri-La

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二万の魔軍は迅速に行動し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: acted swiftly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もいない砂漠に向かって出撃した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and launched towards the deserted desert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？　北東の端にある建物の中？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? In the building at the northeast edge?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはそんなとこにいるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Kayblis really there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうにゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes, nya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 基本的に仕事もないんで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, he has no work,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもそこでボーッとしてるにゃん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so he’s always just spacing out there, nyan...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総大将なのに、んな端っこにいるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though he’s the commander-in-chief, he’s in such a corner?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリス様はくっさいから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kayblis smells bad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなの方が離れて行ったにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so everyone stayed away from him, nya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、ケイブリスの居場所は分かった！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we know where Kayblis is!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後はブッ殺すだけだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now all that’s left is to kill him!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案内しろよ、ケイブニャン！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lead the way, Kaybnyan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ううう……殺されるにゃあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uuuu... I’m going to be killed, nya...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなこと話したってバレたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it gets found out I said this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニャンは殺されるにゃあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nyan will be killed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もうこうなったら絶対に勝つにゃんよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-if it’s come to this, I absolutely have to win, nyan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このケイブニャン様が応援してやるにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This Lord Kaybnyan will be cheering for you, nya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ、じゃないとニャンは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-if not, nyan will...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また、ひっどい使徒だな、お前」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re such a terrible apostle again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかくケイブリスのところに行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, let's go to Kayblis's place!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-okay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけでお前を拷問だー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, that means you’re going to be tortured!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぴぇーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pyeeeeee!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほ、捕虜への虐待は条約違反にゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hoho, mistreatment of prisoners is a violation of the treaty, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゅねーぶ、じゅねーぶ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geneva, Geneva!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、ニャンには動物愛護団体がついてるにゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, Nyan has an animal rights group backing him, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛護動物をみだりに殺したり、苛めた者は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who kill or mistreat protected animals

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二年以下の懲役、または二百万以下の罰金にゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: face up to two years imprisonment or fines up to two million, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は使徒であって愛護動物ではなぁーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re an apostle, not a protected animal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「びえーーん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bwieeeen!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この体は未成熟すぎて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This body is too immature,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モチベーションが湧かないぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t get motivated...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいや、脱げばすごいタイプかも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, maybe she's amazing once undressed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほいっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here we go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはケイブニャンの服をすぽーんと剥ぎ取った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance swiftly stripped off Kaybnyan’s clothes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……がっかり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Disappointing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう意味にゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶわわっ、裸に剥かれるなんて屈辱にゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Buwawa, being stripped naked is a humiliation, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゅねーぶさんに言って叱ってもらうにゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll tell Geneve-san to scold you, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 服を着ながらケイブニャンがふらぁ〜っと移動する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaybnyan, while dressing, swayed unsteadily as she moved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、ニャンは何があっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, no matter what happens, nyan

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の言うことを聞いたりなんて――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will never listen to what humans say—

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

nyan"},{"lineNumber":181080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間の言うことを聞いたりなんて――","translatedEnglishLine":"will never listen to what humans say—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、普段と命令の手順が違うが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the usual order procedure is different...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、誰かに確認を取った方がいいんじゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shouldn't we confirm this with someone?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、なにしてる、すぐに準備しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what are you doing? Get ready immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブニャン様の言うことを聞かないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you don't listen to Lord Kaybnyan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様に反乱分子だとチクられるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kayblis will report you as a rebel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなれば、あの慎重なケイブリス様のこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that happens, knowing cautious Lord Kayblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反乱の芽はすぐさま取り除くからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he will immediately nip any sprouts of rebellion in the bud...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達なんてあっという間に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We would be gone in no time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞぉーっと魔物兵達は背筋を冷やした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon soldiers felt a chill down their spines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怒りを買わないうちに、今すぐ向かうぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's head out immediately before we incur his wrath!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍進軍じゅーんび！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prepare for full army advance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうしてシャングリラに駐留していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the 20,000 demon army stationed in Shangri-La

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二万の魔軍は迅速に行動し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: acted swiftly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もいない砂漠に向かって出撃した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and launched towards the deserted desert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？　北東の端にある建物の中？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? In the building at the northeast edge?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはそんなとこにいるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Kayblis really there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうにゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes, nya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 基本的に仕事もないんで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, he has no work,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもそこでボーッとしてるにゃん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so he’s always just spacing out there, nyan...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総大将なのに、んな端っこにいるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though he’s the commander-in-chief, he’s in such a corner?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリス様はくっさいから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kayblis smells bad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなの方が離れて行ったにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so everyone stayed away from him, nya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、ケイブリスの居場所は分かった！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we know where Kayblis is!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後はブッ殺すだけだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now all that’s left is to kill him!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案内しろよ、ケイブニャン！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lead the way, Kaybnyan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ううう……殺されるにゃあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uuuu... I’m going to be killed, nya...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなこと話したってバレたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it gets found out I said this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニャンは殺されるにゃあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nyan will be killed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もうこうなったら絶対に勝つにゃんよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-if it’s come to this, I absolutely have to win, nyan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このケイブニャン様が応援してやるにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This Lord Kaybnyan will be cheering for you, nya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ、じゃないとニャンは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-if not, nyan will...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また、ひっどい使徒だな、お前」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re such a terrible apostle again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかくケイブリスのところに行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, let's go to Kayblis's place!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-okay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけでお前を拷問だー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, that means you’re going to be tortured!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぴぇーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pyeeeeee!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほ、捕虜への虐待は条約違反にゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hoho, mistreatment of prisoners is a violation of the treaty, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゅねーぶ、じゅねーぶ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geneva, Geneva!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、ニャンには動物愛護団体がついてるにゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, Nyan has an animal rights group backing him, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛護動物をみだりに殺したり、苛めた者は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who kill or mistreat protected animals

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二年以下の懲役、または二百万以下の罰金にゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: face up to two years imprisonment or fines up to two million, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は使徒であって愛護動物ではなぁーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re an apostle, not a protected animal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「びえーーん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bwieeeen!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この体は未成熟すぎて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This body is too immature,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モチベーションが湧かないぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t get motivated...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいや、脱げばすごいタイプかも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, maybe she's amazing once undressed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほいっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here we go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはケイブニャンの服をすぽーんと剥ぎ取った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance swiftly stripped off Kaybnyan’s clothes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……がっかり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Disappointing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう意味にゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶわわっ、裸に剥かれるなんて屈辱にゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Buwawa, being stripped naked is a humiliation, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゅねーぶさんに言って叱ってもらうにゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll tell Geneve-san to scold you, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 服を着ながらケイブニャンがふらぁ〜っと移動する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaybnyan, while dressing, swayed unsteadily as she moved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、ニャンは何があっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, no matter what happens, nyan

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の言うことを聞いたりなんて――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will never listen to what humans say—
